extracted_information: AdjustCRM is an AI-powered claims management software designed for public adjusters to manage and track the entire claims process. It offers an intuitive, modern UI with powerful AI automations to enhance visibility and save time. The platform supports file uploads with AI-driven processing and tagging for searchability, and comprehensive claim lifecycle management from signup to close, including client updates and progress tracking. It enables users to track unlimited claims, manage financials, and collect unlimited leads. Client portals are available for communication and updates. Support includes basic email support for the Solo plan and priority support (phone, chat, email) with a 24-hour response time for the Team plan. Integration capabilities vary by plan.

plans.name: Solo Adjuster
plans.description: The perfect plan for public adjusters starting out. All the essentials to track and grow your business.

plans.name: Team
plans.description: Bring your team onboard to track claims. More integrations, more support, and extra perks.

items: Easiest and most powerful tool for public adjusters
Manage and track every step of the claims process
Modern UI that is easy to use and navigate
Unprecedented visibility into public adjusting business
Intelligent AI processes and tags file contents for searchability
Seamless experience for managing every part of the claim lifecycle (from signup to close)
Supports up to 5 team members (Team plan)
Option to add more team members by contacting sales
Priority support via phone, chat, email (Team plan)

crm_functionality: The platform centralizes claims management, client communication via a portal, lead collection, and financial tracking, acting as a specialized CRM for public adjusters.
contact_management: Includes client portals for updates, tracking progress, and collecting unlimited leads. Allows for managing relationships and communication related to claims.
reporting: The content mentions 'unprecedented visibility into your public adjusting business' and 'track financials', implying reporting capabilities, but no explicit 'reporting' feature or dashboard is detailed.
mobile_capabilities: No explicit mention of mobile applications or specific mobile responsiveness features.
security: No explicit details on security measures (e.g., encryption, data protection protocols, compliance standards) are provided in the content. Links to 'Privacy' and 'Terms' policies are present in the footer.
